events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't been updated for several days either.
The issue is classified as a delivery delay based on the customer's report about late shipping and lack of tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team member to assist with the late shipment inquiry.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand your package hasn't arrived and I’m here to help you resolve this issue.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the delay further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The tracking last showed it was in transit but no updates for 5 days now.
I’ve checked with the carrier, and it appears there is a delay due to weather conditions. We expect delivery within the next 3 days and will monitor closely.
Thanks for the update. I’m disappointed that it’s delayed but I appreciate you checking with the carrier for me.
Your package has now been delivered according to the carrier’s confirmation. Please check and let us know if everything is in order.
Just following up to ensure that you received your order and that everything is satisfactory. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting our support.
